actions.name: Gore
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 18 (3d8+5) piercing damage.

actions.name: Thunderous Bray (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: Emits a resounding bray in a 15 ft. cone. All in area make a DC 13 Con save. On a failure a creature takes 14 (4d6) thunder and is incapacitated until the end of its next turn. On a success a creature takes half the damage and isn't incapacitated.

special_abilities.name: Hold Breath
special_abilities.desc: Can hold its breath for 10 min.
